update.name: Online Users for K2
update.description: Online Users for K2 (K2 Online Users) is a simple Joomla module for displaying the avatars of online users. It uses K2 avatar of each user to show a list of online users. You can easily customize different options of this module. K2 Online Users provides the capability of excluding the given users. You can limit the number of displaying avatars and load more avatars by using AJAX technique.
